item1: Canton refinery located south Cleveland, Ohio. Canton refinery processes sweet sour crude oils, including production nearby Utica Shale, into gasoline, distillates, asphalt, propane, NGLs petrochemicals heavy fuel oil. Canton refinery earned designation OSHA VPP Star site. Mandan, North Dakota Refinery (71 mbpcd) Mandan refinery located outside Bismarck, North Dakota.
